title: Ep. 180: Getting Witchy with Craig Jessup, Makeup Supervisor for Wicked Broadway
itunes:title: Ep. 180: Getting Witchy with Craig Jessup, Makeup Supervisor for Wicked Broadway

description:
Craig Jessup, makeup supervisor for Wicked Broadway, tells us how he went from working with Kevyn Aucoin to working on the Broadway smash, which celebrates its 16th anniversary this week. We chat about Craig's theatrical makeup must-haves (including his favorite wipes), his scariest career moment, and how he gets Elphaba's green skin so good.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand
